about_the_game:
Welcome to Flow Of Fortune!

1. Learning Through Practice

A safe playground to hone financial skills and test risky moves without losing real money.

2. A Unique Blend of Role-Playing and Economic StrategiesYour character grows like in an RPG, yet you manage assets and businesses reminiscent of a classic board game.

3. Solo or Multiplayer GameplayCompete with friends online or go solo, experimenting with various tactics and starting conditions.

4. No ViolenceYou don’t solve problems through conflict. It’s all about sensible financial policy, negotiation skills, and resource allocation.

5. Excitement Without FearVirtual dice rolls add dynamism and unpredictability; mistakes don’t cost you anything in real life—only valuable lessons.

Why This Game Is For You

  • Overcome Your Fear of Investments and Mistakes
    Most people hesitate to invest or run a business, worried about making a fatal error. Flow to Fortune lets you try out any financial strategy without real-world losses, helping you realize that errors are simply part of the journey to success.

  • Understand How the “Wealthy” Think and Use Their Time
    In this game, you’ll see the difference between those who live paycheck to paycheck and those who invest in assets generating consistent income. Discover why effective time management and careful planning give you a crucial edge toward financial stability.

  • Learn from Real-Life Scenarios
    Though Flow to Fortune has the feel of a board game, it mirrors many real-world situations. You can practice running a business, weathering market downturns, facing unexpected expenses, and deciding whether bigger risks might lead to even greater rewards.

Core Mechanics

1. Digital Board Setup
Roll virtual dice, move along the board, and encounter diverse events—ranging from lucrative deals and training courses to unexpected expenses and crises.

2. Time Management
Allocate monthly hours among work, skill upgrades, business activities, and leisure. Any neglected area can drag you down eventually.

3. Business and Investments
Start with a small venture or jump straight into stocks, real estate, or new projects. Be prepared, though, for market instability and risks.

4. Skill Development
Level up your character’s technical, social, or other abilities—each providing bonuses for managing assets or reducing the hours you need to spend.

5. No Violence or Aggression
This game focuses on logical thinking and personal growth over conflict or combat.

Flow to Fortune delivers an engaging, educational experience that helps you see your mistakes not as failures, but as opportunities to learn. Dive into the world of clever budgeting, time allocation, and strategic growth—without fear of real-world losses or aggression.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible

short_description: Build fortunes in a digital board game of economy, strategy, and no violence. Manage time, expand businesses, and shape your success.
